## TwilioErrors namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [GenericError](./twilio-voice-react-native.twilioerrors_namespace.genericerror_class.md) | Generic error that the SDK will raise when encountering an error. Can be used to describe backend errors. |
|  [InvalidStateError](./twilio-voice-react-native.twilioerrors_namespace.invalidstateerror_class.md) | Error describing that the SDK has entered or is attempting to enter an invalid state. |
